column4: my screen resoution seems to be 640x480 yet the screen resoution application says 1024x768
is that for everything you use.. or just a certain program?
have you tried adjust the monitor itself.. i have had that problem before with some monitors.. might be yours too
there are buttons on the bottom of the monitor... use those to find the V-access and the H-access then adjust each one and then degauss it with the buttont that says degauss
